page.title: 17Farming (2)
page.content: The landlord of this farm is a wealthy London businessman who lives in the large country mansion in the centre of what was once a large estate, but which has been divided up into a number of smaller holdings. One such farm includes 180 acres of arable and 200 acres of woodland. He possesses 100{Fresian}cows and approximately 30 {beef cattle}( which are a{Fresian}and {Herefordshire}cross ). The crops grown include{wheat}and{barley}in a rotation with{hay, silage}and{grazing.}The farmer also brings beef cattle from his other farm to gain the benefit of the rich meadow grass of the fields around the{River Pang.}A{gamekeeper looks after the{woodland, pheasants, {deer}and the{trout}in the Pang which is available for private fishing.
